115121.content:
“Where are we going?” Jessica asked her husband. They were walking down a lonely road with their backpacks loaded with all their belongings. “My feet hurt.”

“Almost there honey,” Luke said, “the guy we are rooming with said he’ll pick us up at the edge of town.”

“Who did we go with again?”

“Some guy named Derrick Durham. He’s willing to give us a month free rent, which should be enough time for me to find a job.”

“Is he cute?”

“I don’t know,” Luke whined, “and what if he is?”

“Well, you always said you wanted to try a threesome.” Jessica smiled wide.

“…a threesome with another girl, not with a dude. Especially not with a dude that’s the size of a skyscraper.”

The neighborhood started to get sparse and barren the further the couple walked. They reached the last leg of the trip which was a road with many warning signs, warning Lilliputians that a Gulliverian road was not too far away. The desert all around them was nondescript: just endless sand, rock, and nothingness. The couple sweat through their clothes as the low lying sun burned their exposed arms and legs.

Jessica drank the last of her water, and tossed the empty bottle behind her back. “I can’t believe the first Gulliverian we will be meeting will be the same person we are going to be living with.” She said.

“I hope he’s cool and nice.” Luke wiped the sweat from his brow. “The people that post to the roommate finder website have to have a background check, so he’s not like a criminal or anything like that.”

“That just means he hasn’t been caught.”

“Well, let’s hope for the best.” Luke stopped when he reached the very edge of the town. The road ceased and there was nothing left but desert. “If anything, we can look for another roommate to bunk with.”

Jessica looked around and saw nothing. “When is he going to meet us?”

“We actually got here just in time.” Luke placed a hand in front of his forehead to shield his eyes from the relentless sun. He looked left and right but saw nothing but open land. “Wait, I think that’s him.”

Far off in the horizon, a rectangular object contrasted itself from the tan desert. A large mass emerged from the rectangle and began moving faster than an object that size should be moving. The sand in front of the couple started trembling and vibrating. Luke was the first to feel the rumble under his feet.

Luke motioned to Jessica to put on their headset so that they could talk to Derrick. Jessica was more excited than Luke as she gazed upon the approaching giant. Jessica secretly admired Derrick’s body. He was only wearing shorts and a dirty pair of sneakers. His bronze skin glistened with a thin sheet of sweat as it tanned under the burning sun. His pecs looked like they were sculpted; his abs had faint lines outlining his six-pack. His traps were like soft hills rolling from his neck to his shoulders.

Derrick stopped in front of the couple. A plum of sand billowed from out under his sneakers as he took his final step. Even Derrick’s calves were sculpted and bulging as he stood in front of the one inch couple.

“You Luke?” Derrick’s deep voice was heard through the headset and felt throughout the Lilliputian’s bodies.

“Yea, that’s me. This is my wife, Jessica.” Luke’s voice was shaky as he stood in Derrick’s shadow.

“Hello to the both of you,” Derrick was monotone and almost uninterested. “My car is over there. You two don’t mind me carrying you over there, do you?”

“We don’t mind,” Jessica said excitingly.

Derrick lowered his hands with his palm facing up. Jessica hopped on and with slight hesitation, so did Luke. This wasn’t the first time Derrick interacted with Lilliputians. He felt their almost weightless body in his rough hands. He walked back to his car and let the couple down on the passenger seat.

Derrick wasn’t in the mood to talk. He simply went through the motions of driving his car home. There were other things on his mind.

Derrick lowered Luke and Jessica into a large plastic container with no lid. Soon after, Derrick started his car and took off. The plastic floor underneath Luke and Jessica didn’t offer much grip, so the couple went tumbling backwards when the gigantic car started to move.

“Try not to stand up.” A friendly voice said beside them. “It’s too easy to lose your balance when you stand up.”

“Thanks for the tip,” Jessica said genuinely. She and Luke looked around and noticed they weren’t alone. There were many Lilliputians just like them all around the container. They all had bags on their back and looked as if they were travelling. Moving to Derrick’s home as roommates no doubt. “I thought we were the only roommates Derrick signed on for,” she said to Luke.

“I guess having many Lilly roommates makes sense for Derrick. I mean, look how big he is. I bet even with all of us, it wouldn’t take up a whole lot of room in his home. I hope he lowers the rent too.” Luke whispered back.

“You’re so cheap.”

Derrick brought his car to a rolling stop and then got out. Jessica admired his strong back muscles as his huge mass exited the car.

“My name is Joshua, by the way.” The friendly Lilly said. “So are you guys excited?”

11512122.content:
“Excited about being roommates?” Luke asked with his left brow raising. “I guess. I’ve never really seen a Gulliverian until now. It’s going to be interesting being roommates with one.”

“Roommates?” Josh asked. “I meant the challenge.”

“What challenge?” Luke asked a little worried.

“You know, the challenge.”

“Josh, what the fuck are you talking about?” Luke asked. “We signed up to be roommates with Derrick.”

“Oh, you guys must be the blind volunteers.” Josh said, as if he made some sort of revelation. “Guys like Derrick like to get willing volunteers and not-so-willing volunteers.”

Luke felt his heart thump in his chest. He wasn’t exactly sure what Josh was talking about, but he didn’t like it. “Volunteer for what?”

“The challenge.” Josh said in a matter-of-fact kind of tone.

Jessica could see Luke about to lose his temper, so she decided to interject before her husband blew up on Josh. “Josh, you need to explain to us what this challenge is, and why we don’t know anything about it. See, my husband and I signed up to be roommates with Derrick, and that’s it.”

“Oh, uh, the challenge is like a cat and mouse game. We are the mouse and Derrick is the cat. If you survive for a week, Derrick will give us the option to be free or continue being the mouse.”

“Survive?” Jessica asked. “What do you mean survive?”

“Survive. Live. Not die.”

“He’s going to kill us?” Luke nearly shouted.

“Well, yea, if he catches you. Try not to get caught.” None of this bothered Josh, but the Lilly couple was visibly trembling. “Don’t look so worried, I survived one of these a couple of months ago. It was super easy. I hope to survive this one too, or at least last a long time. Derrick seems like an alright guy.”

The trunk of the car popped open, breaking the Lilly conversation going on in the plastic container. They could hear Derrick unloading something and then shutting the trunk. He jumped back in the driver seat and took off without putting his seatbelt on around his bare chest.

“Uh, excuse me?” Jessica said over her headset, hoping that Derrick would hear her. “I think there’s been a misunderstanding.”

“What are you doing?” Josh grabbed her shoulder.

In that instance Luke shoved Josh with enough force to send him to the ground. “Don’t you fucking lay a finger on my wife.”

“Jeez, sorry.” Josh didn’t bother getting up. “I was just going to tell her not to bother talking to Derrick. If you guys thought you were going to be roommates, well that means he tricked you. Remember what I said earlier? He gets both volunteers and non-volunteers for this challenge. More excitement, you know?”

Luke was still steaming and getting aggravated over Josh instead of the situation.

“Just stick with me,” Josh grinned. “I’ve survived this thing before with no problem. There are just a few tips and tricks to keep in mind of, and you’ll be safe.” Josh got up to his feet, carefully balancing himself as the gigantic car moved. “Who knows? You might even have fu—“

Josh’s speech was cutoff when three pillars of flesh came down from the sky like a massive crane. He was plucked and pulled towards the sky like a rocket. Derrick didn’t even bother to look at the little Lilliputian he captured. His eyes were on the road in front of him.

“No, no, no.” Josh was screaming. “I was supposed to survive longer. Not now! Put me down! I want to have fun befo—“

Josh’s pleas were muffled from inside Derrick’s mouth. His tiny body was kneaded and lathered in thick saliva. The backpack he had on his back came detached and spilled around the giant’s mouth. Derrick wasn’t gentle with the Lilliputian’s body. He slammed the tiny thing against his molars, inside of his cheek, and the roof of his mouth. If he listened carefully, he could hear the tiny Lilliputian whimpering and crying.

Derrick swallowed without effort. A tiny bulge appeared to travel downwards inside his muscular throat, before it vanished. Derrick spat out the Lilliputian’s backpack. Little T-shirts and pants rained down from his mouth and some article of clothing landed on his muscular pecs.

Jessica kept repeating “oh my god” over and over as she witnessed her acquaintance being eaten so casually. Luke had enough common sense to grab his wife and pull her down towards the plastic floor. Derrick’s hand already invaded the tiny prison and was looking for more to eat. He grabbed a female Lilliputian this time, and just like Josh, popped her screaming form into his mouth. He toyed with the woman more than he did with Josh before swallowing her whole.

“Luke, what have we gotten ourselves into?” Jessica was nearly hysterical.

An hour past before Derrick arrived home. During the car ride, Luke and Jessica kept looking at Derrick’s chiseled midsection. They wondered about the fate of Josh and the other woman. They wondered if they were already digested or still struggling to stay alive within the giant’s stomach.

Derrick grabbed the plastic container and kept it under his arm. He walked around to the trunk of his car and pulled out a yellow school bus, packed with seniors from a Lilliputian high school.

“Holy shit,” Luke said as he looked through the clear plastic walls of his prison. “Are those more non-volunteers? What the fuck is wrong with this guy?”

Derrick took his prize to his house and set the bus and plastic container on the ground. He made sure the front door was shut before he acknowledged the Lilliputians.

“Welcome all to the Giant Hunger Games.” Derrick raised his hands in the air, giving the Lilliputians a view of traps which gave his body a perfect V shape. “We are going to have fun this week. By the way, my home is your home. It’s only one floor and completely sealed to keep you Lilly twerps from escaping. If you hide from me well enough, I won’t find you and eat you. IF you suck at hiding, well…” He patted his six-pack.

The teens from the bus started coming out and looking around the new world they were in. It was difficult to process what Derrick was saying because although they’ve heard of this supposed challenge or game, or whatever you want to call it, they always thought it was urban legend. Nobody really believed that Gulliverians went out kidnapping Lilliputians for these sick games.

“I love eating Lilliputians,” Derrick began flexing his arms, showing off his bulging biceps. “They are jam packed with protein and have made me huge over the last year. I’ve eaten so many of you little fucks to make me huge.” He flexed his pecs and broad back muscles, terrifying the tiny Lilliputians. “So many of your kind has made me this big. But I want to be bigger. Which means I need to lift more, and eat more.”

A massive tent was pitched underneath Derrick’s basketball shorts. He stroked his cock as he looked down at the fifty or so Lilliputians.

“I’m going jog for a bit. That should give you all enough time to hide and get settled in. When I come back, I’m going to be hungry. So say goodbye to your friends now because five of you will be here in no time.” He pointed to his stomach.

Derrick lightly kicked over the plastic container so that the Lilliputians inside spilled out. The deep thuds of his footsteps receded as Derrick headed out the front door for his jog. Luke and Jessica held onto each other and looked at the other frightened Lilliputians. Some were actually excited and maintained a cool head as they ventured deep into Derrick’s house.

Luke and Jessica had to decide what to do next…

115212.content:
Jennifer looked at her nearly empty bank account while on her laptop. It’s been a tough couple of years since she moved out from her parents. She worked in retail and took some college classes at night when she could afford it.

Jennifer lived in a studio apartment which consisted of one room and a bathroom. She had a mattress on the floor and one rickety desk she bought from the thrift store. Her room was typically messy with clothes scattered all around. A mini fridge that stood in the corner had expired food and empty wine bottles.

A notification alerted Jennifer of an email. She propped herself up on her mattress with her laptop on her lap. The laptop warmed her bare legs as she clicked open the email. No one ever believed Jacob when he told them what he did for a living.

He was a short, almost girlishly slender man. With his black-rimmed glasses and slacks and his gray sweaters, he resembled a professor at a university or some other sort of academic. Whenever he said that he was a bounty hunter, people would just look at him incredulously and chuckle. Bounty hunters were supposed to be huge manly men, the sort of men with horrific scars and eyepatches and stubble on their square jaws. Not someone who looked like he belonged in a library poring through Greek plays.

But a bounty hunter was what he was and he prided himself on always bringing back his quarry, dead or alive. Nor was he limited to just other Gulliverians. He would take down Lilliputians and Brobdingnagians as well. Size didn’t matter to him. A bounty was a bounty, as long as he was paid. And secretly, he enjoyed the challenge of bringing down giants and giantesses. It never failed to please him when he saw the shock in their enormous eyes as the titans tumbled to the ground, incapacitated in one way one or another. The best had been a towering bruiser who had been massive even for a Brobdingnagian and who was wanted on a dozen different charges, from assault to homicide. After an utterly terrifying chase through several Gulliverian towns, Jacob had managed to outsmart the giant by leading him straight to the authorities. The next thing that the thug had known, he was in shackles and on his way to a Brobdingnagian jail.

It wasn’t just his intelligence that made him a match for practically any quarry. He was also a skilled engineer, mostly self-taught, although he had learned a great deal in college before he dropped out. Most of his weapons he designed himself and he was proud of each one. That was what he doing the day that his phone rang…sketching out the schematics for new prototype weapons. Jacob was trying to decide the specific neurotoxin that he should include in a modified tranquilizer gun when he heard Sally answer the phone.

From where he was sitting, he could see her head tipped to one side as she spoke into the phone, her curly chestnut-brown hair spilling down over her back and shoulders. Sally had started off as his best friend, then his secretary, then his lover. Right now she was acting as a secretary, talking into the phone and typing up notes on her tablet. Jacob put down his mechanical pencil just as she hung up.

“You got another one,” she said.

“What’s this bounty for?”

“Two Brobdingnagian felons who’ve been using Lilliputian cities as their personal playgrounds. They’re calling themselves ‘Jack and Jill,’ which is a pretty terrible joke if you ask me. Anyway, the Lilliputian government is willing to pay you a large amount to bring them to justice.” Sally’s long crimson nails tapped on the tablet. “Of course, you still have those two other bounties. But it’s up to you.”

The sports car pulled through the autonomic gates and Lucy marveled at her surroundings. Everything was so astonishingly expensive, including the car (which she knew was a Bugatti) and the castle of a house, located on a cliff overlooking the bluish-gray ocean. But what amazed her most of all was her date, Seth. He was still dressed in his Armani suit from work, where he was the CEO of one of the largest defense companies in the world. Not only was he insanely wealthy, but he was the most handsome man that Lucy had ever seen. Considering that she was a model and worked in an industry where most people were beautiful, this was saying a lot.

As soon as he parked the car, Seth stepped out and walked around to let Lucy out, opening the door for her. What a gentleman, she thought. Rich and handsome and courteous. She couldn’t believe her good luck.

Her date led her into his mansion, where she gawked some more at the sheer size and opulence of the rooms. Everything was tastefully decorated and Lucy got the impression that many of the paintings on the wall were as outrageously expensive as the car. She pretended to study one while he poured her a glass of merlot.

“Your house is amazing,” Lucy told him, not sure what else to say. Normally, she wasn’t shy at all around other people, but there was something about him that made her bashful.

“Thank you, my dear. But you haven’t seen anything yet,” he replied, flashing her a perfect smile. Once more she followed him, this time out onto a huge balcony where she could see the rolling waves of the ocean.

“Oh, my. It’s so beautiful out here,” she gasped, feeling the salty air stir her short black hair. Lucy took a minute to study the breathtaking sight before her. Then she noticed what was on the patio table: a small wooden box that looked like it belonged in an antiques shop. It intrigued her, just sitting there like that, although she didn’t touch it, of course. Seth saw where her attention was focused and he smiled. He motioned for her to sit down on one of the patio chairs and as she did, he opened the box. Inside were a half-dozen tiny people, looking up apprehensively at her.

“Are those Lilliputians?” Lucy already knew the answer.

“My own private stock,” he said, reaching in and taking out a young woman with braided hair. “I hope you’re not offended…”

Lucy shook her head. She had never really viewed Lilliputians as equals; in fact, there had been a few parties after photo-shoots where Lilliputians had attended…as hors d'oeuvres. It was fashionable amongst some members of Gulliverian society to kidnap the tiny people and use them for all kinds of terrible purposes. Was it illegal? Yes. Did Lucy actually care? No.

“Excellent! You see, most people don’t fully appreciate power. Not even most Brobdingnagians do. I, on the other hand, have become a connoisseur of power. Right, my dear?” Seth squeezed the minuscule Lilliputian woman in his hand and she howled in pain. Lucy continued to watch, morbidly fascinated.

“Right?” He repeated.

“R-right!” The Lilliputian agreed frantically.

“I like to toy with them. To gain their trust and then watch them die.”

Lucy’s heart hammered in her chest, not out of fear but out of sadistic delight. In his hand, the bug-sized woman began to tremble violently. With his free hand, Seth gently stroked her hair; then his grip began to tighten. A high-pitched squeal of pain erupted from the poor woman’s mouth and Lucy felt strangely aroused. Chewing on her lower lip, she leaned forward so that she could the Lilliputian as she screamed and tried to free herself. But Seth continued to squeeze, his powerful fingers constricting tighter and tighter until there was a wet crack. Dark blood seeped down his palm, running over his wrist and expensive Rolex watch. The tiny woman’s eyes bulged in their sockets and then glazed over as she died. Seth released her body, allowing it to splatter on the ground.

Lucy couldn’t help but grin as he took out a silk handkerchief and began to meticulously wipe the blood from his hand.

“That was so hot,” she said in a voice husky with lust.

“I agree.” Seth placed his hand on her knee, just below her skirt. Lucy expected him to push her skirt up, to feel the dampness already soaking her panties. But instead, he began to shout.

“Amanda,” he called out and Lucy wondered who “Amanda” was. A maid, maybe?

The ground shook and then she appeared. Not a maid, but a Brobdingnagian woman wearing a purple bikini, her dark brown hair pulled back from her face. Lucy wasn’t sure where she had come from; the private beach, perhaps. Not that it really mattered. What did matter was that she was strolling toward them, her eyes on the two Gulliverians. As she paused before the balcony, close enough that Lucy could detect the scent of her sunscreen, Seth laughed.

“I was wondering where you were,” he said to the giantess. She gave him a meek smile.

“Sorry I wasn’t here sooner, Seth,” the Brobdingnagian apologized.

Lucy felt rage bubbling up in her. “Who the hell is this?”

“This is Amanda. She’s my girlfriend.”

“Nice to meet you,” the giantess said.

“I don’t know what kind of game you’re playing,” Lucy hissed. “But I-,”

She was interrupted when the Brobdingnagian reached down and picked her up around the middle, lifting her from the balcony. One of Lucy’s stiletto high-heels fell free as she hung in mid-air, the giantess’ face looming high above her. Fear had taken hold and she quivered as Amanda placed her other hand on the balcony, allowing Seth to step onto her palm. Once he was seated comfortably, she carried them both away from the mansion and toward the small strip of beach.

To Lucy’s relief, the giantess placed her on the sand. She immediately turned on Seth, who was also now standing on the ground.

“I want you to take me home! Now! I never want to see you again, you asshole,” Lucy growled. Seth ignored her, glancing up at Amanda instead.

“Amanda, would you be so kind as to take care of her?”

The giantess frowned. “But Seth, I always feel bad about doing that.”

“It would make me so happy, my love.”

“Oh, okay,” Amanda replied reluctantly. She stood back up to her skyscraper-sized height, her immense body hiding the late afternoon sun. Her mouth filled with sand and she tried to spit it out as the unimaginable pressure descended on her body. Amanda was only putting a small amount of weight on her, but it was enough to make her wheeze in pain.

“Like I said, I like to gain my victims’ trust…” Seth was grinning madly.

“Seth, please,” Lucy begged. But he just glanced up at Amanda and drew a line across his throat with one finger, the classic cutthroat gesture.

“I’m really sorry about this,” the Brobdingnagian said almost sadly. Lucy couldn’t even see her face, only her toes as she leaned forward, applying more pressure. The agony was instantaneous, like having a multi-ton boulder dropped upon her entire body. She would have screamed except she couldn’t draw a breath as her lungs were compressed. A series of sharp cracks, like someone snapping dry twigs, filled her ears and she somehow knew that it was her bones shattering. Lucy’s last image was of Seth, smiling viciously. Then her body flattened, her viscera spilling out from beneath the giantess’ foot in appalling patterns.

1321.content:
The portal phenomenon that transported people from Earth to the Swift Universe knew no bounds. Anyone and any location was susceptible and at constant risk.

The Escape was a tiny and cramped club located in Seoul, South Korea. On any given night, the club would be filled with people of all races thanks to the nearby university. The club was dank and dark, lit by an array of neon lights and obnoxious strobe machines. The club gave off a cyberpunk sort of feel, especially when it rained outside.

The electronic music blared as the club goers flirted, danced, and drank their soju. The girls wore their best skimpy outfits while the guys ogled them. A flash of white lit as bright as the sun overcame the inside of the club in a split second. Minutes later, a few more students stumbled in the club only to find it empty. Even the bar tenders were gone.

The club goers have been chosen by the portal. They were no longer in their dank club, but outside during a clear a day. Their eyes winced as they tried to get accustomed to the bright sun. All their senses were out of whack. They could smell the ocean, feel a pebbly ground, hear crashing waves—complete opposite the electronic music, sticky hard floors, and smell of spilt drinks. It didn’t help them much that they were all drunk with internal body clocks telling them it was one in the morning.

Chloe wore her skirt and t-shirt as she walked the beach in her bare feet. She was a bit heavier than the average Brobby, but a lot prettier than the skinny bitches at her school. She didn’t consider herself fat, just a little soft. At any rate, she didn’t give a shit about her weight and wasn’t about to diet—since that would mean she would have to cut back on her intake of little people. No way that was going to happen.

She walked along the shoreline, scanning the clean sandy beach hoping to find some unlucky souls. A flash of light, like lightning, caught her attention in front of her. She knew what that meant. She walked briskly in anticipation.

“Yes!” Chloe said aloud when she spotted the one inch club goers. “I hit the fucking mother lode.”

30 brand new Gulliverians from Earth were at her feet. She could see that they were dazed and confused by their slow movements and inability to walk straight. She grew even more excited when she saw how attractive and well-dressed they all were.

“Now don’t anyone move,” she told the crowd as she swung her backpack off her shoulders and pulled out a few glass jars. “I’ll make this quick.”

One of the Korean women screamed as she looked up at the 400 foot tall giantess. Chloe kicked up some sand with her foot towards the crowd, gentle to her, painful to the Gulliverians. The club goers fell back into the sandy beach and tried to get a hold of their bearing. Chloe took the moment of their incapacitation to collect them and drop them in her jars.

When Chloe was finished, she slid the jars back in her backpack; all except for the Korean woman who screamed earlier. Chloe lifted her up and held her in front of her eyes. Chloe felt a tinge of jealousy as she looked at the skinny Korean. She stripped the one inch woman and then lowered her into her mouth. Chloe then placed the backpack over her shoulders and continued walking down the beach as she played with the woman in her mouth. Her tongue shoved the fragile thing all around her mouth, coating her in saliva. Chloe swallowed when the woman’s movements grew weak. The tiny lump travelled effortlessly down her throat where she was immediately forgotten.

1322.content:
Chloe took her time walking in the forest, wading through the Gulliverian trees as though they were blades of tall grass. It was nighttime and the only source of light came from the crescent moon overhead. But she didn’t dare to use a flashlight, since she was technically trespassing on Gulliverian territory. Besides, she didn’t want her prey to see her ahead of time.

The trees rubbed against her legs as she crept through them and she was glad that she had decided to dress in plain jeans and a short-sleeved blouse. Once, when she had gone on a similar hunting expedition, she had worn shorts and her legs had been thoroughly scratched. It had been difficult avoiding the inevitable questions from her neighbors and friends.

When Chloe saw the tiny spot of orangish-gold light, she carefully crouched down, trying not to topple any of the fragile little trees. Guillverians, no doubt. Just the thought of the small people made her salivate. She was thankful that she had had a large dinner; otherwise, her stomach would have been growling loudly enough to scare the Guilliverians away.

Tilting her head, she listened with the intensity of a lynx hunting a rabbit. If she concentrated, she could make out faint voices coming from the direction of the flickering light. A predatory smile stretched across her face as she slunk toward them.

***

“Hey, Dylan. Did you find those beers?” Nate asked as he tossed another stick onto the fire. It was too wet and it smoldered and smoked but didn’t catch fire. Out of the corner of his eye, he saw his friend searching through one of the coolers.

“Dude, why do you hang out with him?” Tom whispered, his brawny arm draped around his blonde-haired girlfriend, Katherine. They all looked over at Dylan, who was now looking through the second cooler for the beer. As much as he hated to admit it, Dylan was sort of an embarrassment. They had been friends since they were little kids, but now that Nate had returned home from college, he saw what a big nerd Dylan had become. He was even wearing some sort of math t-shirt with a whole bunch of weird symbols, which Nate guessed was supposed to be funny, except he didn’t get the joke.

Tom, on the other hand, was one of his frat brothers and he was the sort of guy who made the sorority girls swoon. Tall, muscular, tanned: that was how Nate would describe him. He could be sort of a jerk at times, but Nate put up with it. It had been his idea to go camping and so here they were, in the middle of the woods, watching Dylan hunt for the beer.

“He’s my friend,” Nate finally said.

“He’s such a nerd, bro. I bet he’s never got laid.”

Katherine giggled at Tom’s statement and looked at him fawningly. She really was attractive, big-breasted and full-lipped, her eyes a startling sky blue. Nate felt a stab of jealousy.

“Speaking of getting laid, you wanna?” She asked him, batting her fake eyelashes.

“Fuck yeah!”

Nate watched them crawl into their tent and zip up the opening. Meanwhile, Dylan had found the beers and was carrying over a few bottles, trying to balance them in his chubby arms. Without warning, he froze like a deer in headlights, his eyes widening behind his glasses.

“What is it?” Nate asked him, startled to see the blood draining from his face.

“There’s something coming toward us.” Even as Dylan spoke, the ground beneath them quivered like gelatin and there was a sound like thunder. Except thunder wasn’t so rhythmic. The noise was more like…footsteps. Really big ones. Nate stood up just in time to see the gargantuan shape outlined against the trees. At first, it was difficult to make out what it was; then he saw the flash of light high up as the gigantic eyes reflected the moonlight. It was a person, he realized. A Brobdingnagian, to be exact. He heard rumors about them, not all of them good, but he figured that trying to introduce himself would be the best course of action.

“How’s it going?” Nate called up to the Brobdingnagian. The giant (or rather, giantess, since he quickly saw that it was a woman) didn’t say anything as she bent down. As her face drew closer to the fire, he saw that she was pretty despite some extra weight, her green eyes reminding him of a cat’s. Nate didn’t panic until he saw that she was reaching for him, her palm and outstretched fingers swooping down from the sky.

Then he panicked. A lot.

***

Chloe couldn’t help but smile as she picked up the Gulliverian. He was young and handsome and would have been out of her league if he had been a Brobdingnagian. The firelight illuminated his tiny face as she studied him, deciding whether she wanted to eat him now or later. A soft gurgle from her stomach decided for her. She hadn’t had dessert yet and he would be perfect. Almost tenderly, she peeled off his shirt and jeans, giggling as he began to plead with her. It was always so thrilling when they begged for their lives.

His sneakers came off last and she licked at his minute feet, laughing as he shrieked and kicked. Chloe sucked him gradually into her mouth, feeling the almost-microscopic nub of his penis slide against her tongue. She savored his taste, the salt of his sweat and his designer cologne. To her, he tasted better than the finest chocolate. As his friend with the glasses watched, Chloe poked his head into her mouth with a fingertip, pushing him around with her tongue. Rarely did she chew; she disliked the coppery taste of raw meat. Besides, the sensation of tiny people squirming in her stomach was exquisite.

Chloe’s eyes met those of the chubby Guillverian and she slowly swallowed his cute friend, feeling his weak struggles as he traveled down the length of her esophagus and into her belly. She covered her mouth and burped, the insect-sized man still thrashing inside of her. The other Gulliverian cringed as she started to grab for him; then, something else caught her attention. There were groans and moans coming from one of the tents and she seized the top of the tent between her fingers, curious. As soon as she yanked it from the ground, she spotted two more tiny people. It was obvious that she had caught them mid-coitus; they were still joined at the hip. The two Guilliverians gawked up at her, too petrified to move as she plucked them up.

“You two look delicious,” she purred and they both began to scream.

***

Katherine found herself several hundred feet above the ground, shivering despite the warm summer air. The Brobdingnagian’s fingers were constricted tightly around her nude body, the giantess’ monster truck wheel-sized ring digging into her abdomen. As Katherine fought and beat at the coiled fingers, she saw the giantess dangle Tom above her open mouth. She stopped pounding at the columns of flesh just in time to see the Brobdingnagian release him, allowing him to plunge into her waiting mouth.

When she saw her boyfriend devoured, Katherine redoubled her efforts to get away. She would rather have slipped free and plummeted to her death than be eaten by a monster. But the giantess’ grip was too strong and no amount of wiggling could free her. She too was raised before the immense mouth, the lips shining dully as they pulled apart. Even in the relative darkness, she could see the giantess’ teeth and tongue and worst of all, the utter blackness of her throat.

“Nooooo!” Katherine screeched, shrieking until her lungs ran out of air. The Brobdingnagian woman waited until she stopped wailing and then tossed her nonchalantly into her mouth. She saw the massive lips and teeth rush by her in a blur and then she landed on the huge tongue, which was slimy and wet and hideously warm. Saliva washed over her, filling every orifice, but she was too busy pummeling at the ridged roof of the giantess’ mouth to care.

The Brobdingnagian chuckled and closed her lips, leaving Katherine in unbearable darkness. She felt rather than saw the tongue undulate beneath her, pushing back toward the throat. Grabbing wildly for anything to hold onto, she managed to seize hold of one of the back molars. But the tooth was too slick and she gasped as her lost her grip. Her scream echoed loudly around her as she tumbled backwards into the throat. She was aware of being squeezed tightly by the esophagus; then she fell through the sphincter into the hellish depths of the giantess’ stomach. To her horror, she could still hear Tom and Nate, who were slowly being dissolved by the acid.

She gave one final hopeless push against the walls of the stomach; then her consciousness began to fade.

***

Feeling pleasantly full, Chloe glanced around, trying to find the last Guillverian. He had probably fled when he had seen her eating his friends. But when she looked down, there he was, right by her left foot. To her amazement, he was staring up at her with a mixture of adoration and awe. Chloe had never seen anyone look at her that way. She was used to being the plump girl, the one that Brobdingnagian men didn’t look at twice. The tiny man’s admiration was strangely flattering. When she squatted down to pick him up, he didn’t run from her. Slowly, she brought him up to her face, feeling conflicted.

For once in her life, she wasn’t sure what to do…

Pam smiled at that, her hand coming to her right breast and giving is a firm squeeze, earning a sultry moan from her. “Yes, we certainly were. Hm, Miranda? Could you send my that Olympian GPS app? The one with maps for Lilliput?” She asked with a wide grin as she stopped her walk, slowly sitting down, not knowing that her massive ass came down on a spread out town, tens of thousands crushed under it as there was a state fair in the town. She heard Miranda click her tongue in thought.

“Well, alright.” Miranda giggled. “I want pics and vids though. You know how hot you are when you do this sort of thing.” The ‘gentle’ brobbie model giggled. She was just helping a friend out, not actually committing the mass killings herself after all.

Pam smiled wide and lounged back, her hand propping her up as it dug into the ground, deep, massive craters being formed. “Thanks Miranda, you’re a doll. I should come visit you some time soon.” She said. That would be after this little ‘vacation’ though.
134221.title: Continues her milfy  rampage alone   in Lilliput.

choices: Pam goes to play with the airforce
1342211.content:
With their conversation done, Pam brought the phone down from her ear and hung up, a grin spreading across her lips until it became a smirk. If the mites down below had thought her visit was going to be bad before, it was going to get much worse now that she would have precise navigation. She waited a minute before the screen blinked about the download in progress. It would take a small amount of time, about ten minutes. But that was alright, there was plenty for Pam to do before then. With a slight grunt of effort she pushed forward and rose to her feet, mass amounts of debris falling from her rear. To her it was like bits of sand, but to any down below it was like a meteor shower. Of course there weren't many Lillis down below to be devastated by it, as her sitting down had all but wiped out any habitation below her, the shock wave of her countless tons of weight slamming down kicking up a wind and earth quakes that had leveled even more. Of course, Pam could care less about all that.

She smiled wide as she lifted her foot from the ground, a perfect imprint of her massive foot crushed into the ground, and took a step forward. Square miles of forest were utterly devastated with the simple step. She actually smiled, able to feel the faintest fractions of resistance from the trees and rocks and little hills. Her eyes were turned down, scanning for signs of serious life, something to play with, to grind under her body. She began a steady walk across the Liliputian country side, smiling as she did. She tried to imagine how it looked from their view, a towering goddess strolling across their lands, miles at a time, leaving behind devastation that would last for generations. It amused her, more then anything, and exited her. Her hands slowly traced down the curves of her body, one hand stopping to rest on her hip while the other rubbed at her crotch. She let out a small moan of pleasure and bit her lower lip lightly. Something about being among the mite sized people was always a turn on. The power of it all, no doubt. Her eyes slowly closed as she continued walking and rubbing her crotch, but the sudden crunch of metal and concrete snapped her eyes open. She looked down and found her foot trampled across some sort of junction of highways, massive six lane highways leading off in several directions. She wondered where they each lead, and which to follow. And that was when her phone beeped. Her frown turned into an immediate grin of joy, and some evil no doubt, as she brought her phone to her face. She laughed with joy as she saw the app was downloaded and installed. She quickly set about finding her location, her grin forming into a smirk as she saw what was beyond her vision.

To the north was a city, pretty large as well. And to the east was a large air force base. Both tempting targets. A city to ravage, and a military base to show her absolute superiority over.

Choices, choices...
1342211.title: Choices...

13423.content:
"I hate you!" screamed Emily, as the salt air whipped their hair. Mother and daughter on their way to a very wrong day out. "This was supposed to be my treat on my own! How am I supposed to express myself..."

"..sexually?" Pam smiled.

"I HATE you!" screamed the distraught girl.

Pam didn't even bother to answer. She just stared out to sea feeling the wind on her face and imagining what hell her angry frustrated young daughter was going to wreak on a whole country of people less than a millimeter tall. Or what hell she would wreak on them. She licked her lips, tasting the salt air.

This was going to be beyond a diplomatic incident, she knew. War? No. Brobdingnag only allowed rights to Lilliput to placate the Gulliverians. And they only did that for the political faction who cared. What could the Brobs do if they broke the peace? She smiled. Time to stop pandering to insects!

Pamela had been born into money and had married into far more money as a teenager. He died, she prospered, as had her spoiled daughter. The world was whatever they wanted. She looked at Emily. She was shorter than her, at only 5'6 she hadn't inherited her mother's build and Pam was still taller with longer legs even now. And honestly, she liked the jealosy!

After some thought, Pamela had decided on, a fashionable swimsuit, under an even more fashionable ensemble consisting of a plain black halter top with matching skirt, above the knee, sheer stockings and thigh-high black leather boots with a wedge heel. Emily was probably wearing something too. She reminded herself to pay attention later.

************************************************************

Customs. The official is agitated. Little man in an ill fitting uniform. Speaking of which.... Emily is wearing a tartan miniskirt, a short white top and stupidly implactical high heel platform sandals. Pam sighed.

"You really want to go through? Both of you?" From his eyes he was almost pleading.

"You do know who I am?"

"Yes ma'am." he mumbled, "But please be careful. Please. I've worked here a long time and they're people too and..."

Pam glared and pushed the small man aside as they passed into Lilliput...

Mother and daughter walked for a minute.

"Where is it?" wailed Emily.

Pam smirked despite herself. "Look down, Emily! If I'm going to get you into Lilliput, the least you could do is pay attention!"

She indicated down. Between them was a bumpy patch on the ground; a town of tiny 2mm high buildings. Small blurs of colour were crowds of people... The whole village was less a foot across!

On the ground, the people of Lundfulnap stared up in terror. It was near enough to the customs checkpoint that they had seen Brobdingnagians, and sometimes the old official talked to them from a distance, but the shaking ground and the sight of a pair of boots well over a kilometer long and a pair of platforms with a heel nine hundred metres tall was something no-one was prepared for. The ground shook with each of the giantesses footsteps. Windows shattered and powerful winds blew down the streets bringing clouds of dust. Older buildings collapsed and people where knocked over.

"Thank you mom, thank you!" Emily cried stepping over and embracing her mother, and treading on half the village. With her two inch sole she didn't even notice.
13423.title: A Touching Bonding Between Mother And Daughter

14.content:
Reserved to the gentle side of the Swift Universe, this thread explores the lives of the Lilliputians, Gullivers, and Brobdingnagians that aren’t succumbed to senseless violence. Don’t get me wrong, I love senseless violence as evident in my writings, but I don’t want to leave out an unexplored part of this awesome world.

Now, bullying and imposing one’s size does exist in this thread, but we won’t see sociopathic giants terrorizing little ones. Smuttiness can exist in this thread; that’s okay. But the whole point of this thread is to see rational people trying to make rational decisions based on the world they live in. Essentially, the three races try to see each other’s as equals—try to at least.

I will remove any content that doesn’t fit this thread.
14.title: Gentle

choices: Dr. Adams: His methods are a bit unorthodox
Cindy: Loves to party with bigger people
Luanne: Aspiring fighter pilot for the military
141.content: Life isn't too bad for Lilliputians in a world filled with gentle people.
141.title: Lilliputians

choices: Susan, his 26 year old Gulliverian Lab Assistant.
Lei Xing, the 25 year old Primary Brodingnagian Test Subject.
Amanda, the 35 year old Gulliverian Project Manager and Single Mother.
1411.content:
From an early age James Adams was fascinated by the giant sized Gulliverians and their even larger cousins in Brobdingnag, even with the stories of more unpleasant and aggressive contact with both races in times past. And whilst he might have considered roles as an ambassador or investigate their respective cultures, his sharp mind and proven prowess in all of the sciences from youth drove him down the path to become one of Lilliputt's renowned biological academics, an impressive feat for a man only aged 29. And his interest in both races had gone from simply biologically minded to a definite physical attraction to those bigger than he was. James had knew awkwardly that he felt more than a twinge of sexual thrill when he was around an attractive Gulliverian woman, and even more so with a towering Brobdingnagian.

Of course it wasn't simply the fact that Gulliverians and Brobdingnagians were the same as his own kind save bigger, but that they seemed identical in every aspect save size, a matter which with mostly healthy nations between all three races demanded further investigation. James had thus become involved in a project overseen by scientists from Lilliputt, Gulliver and Brobdingnag to learn how exact each race's biology was by checking - internally.

To this end Doctor Adams had worked with technicians on creating both a biosuit which would allow a Lilliputtian to survive inside either of the bodies of the other two races, and from there a transport device for small teams to utilise as a science platform, predominantly for use inside a Brodingnagian as their insides would be easier to navigate. The work had taken nearly two and half years of research and spending a good deal of time adjusting to being in a secure facility with people of all three sizes, but it hadn't been so bad, and the prospect of getting the chance to finally use the suits and craft to explore their larger cousins bodies and determine just how similar they all were was an exciting one.

Plus of course being surrounded by a lot of attractive female scientists with no access to the outside world - since the governments and their science divisions wanted to keep the research a secret until the findings were made for fears that certain parties might disapprove - meant he had met someone he liked a lot...
1411.title: Dr. Adams: Lilliputt Biologist and Body Explorer!

choices: The test is on Lei and Jamie is required to work inside her.
The test is for others, Jamie tries tracking down Lei casually.
14112.content:
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BOT...

It was kind of insane, the Doctor knew that, being attracted to a person who could barely perceive you as a person yourself, or be capable of viewing all of unless from a significant height, though fortunately the facility was in Lei's homeland so there was plenty of space for that, but it was definitely the case with Lei. With her thick black curls and slender yet attractive figure, the fact that she was about six going on seven miles tall to Jamie didn't bother him in the slightest, and he wished it was possible to tell the attractive scientist and main test subject for internal Brobdingnagian exploration how he felt about her. Any time she spoke and that wonderful well developed English with a slight accent emerged amid a vast reverberating quality, Jamie tried not to blush at being aware how much it turned it on and was doing to his body.

Best of all, he was able to go inside of her, because it was his current job to. Though there hadn't been any opportunity for a solo, ideally unrecorded expedition within her beautiful form though, or there be some other studies he'd have liked to try. In his fantasy tests Jamie couldn't decide whether Lei would be aware or unaware of his near microscopic intrusion or not, though if she was she'd certainly approve, likely with a long and powerful moan from those perfect pink lips... also in his fantasy tests Jamie reckoned she had be completely able to... ahem, stimulate her. Totally possible.

With a long awkward sigh the doctor rose from his likely unethical thoughts, only to hear a alarm go which he recognized to indicate some new tests were imminent and he might be required. Hopefully on Lei?
14112.title: Lei Xing, Brobby Test Subject

1412.content:
"Ugh." Cindy woke up with a splitting headache. Last night had been great but she was definitely paying for it. She grimaced as she opened her eyes, daylight blinding her momentarily. "Somebody turn down the sun..." She muttered as she sat up right in a teal seat of her carrier. She reached under her mane of curly blonde hair and rubbed her stiff neck. She looked through the glass roof for her friend. "Where's Michelle?" As if on cue, a thunderous roar rang out from behind her.

She turned around to find Michelle's cheek pressing on the other side of the wall. Her Brobby friend's sideways face loomed close, snoring lightly. The Lilliputian girl flinched as the cavernous mouth hung slightly open, its full lips directly above her ceiling. Her carrier had fallen into the incline made by Michelle's gargantuan head. Tan skin pressed against the wall. A thick deluge of drool fell from above, covering Cindy's transparent living space in disgusting slobber. She remembered her titanic, equally drunk friend deciding to crash on the couch. She noticed neither of them had taken off their headsets before passing out. She turned her own on.

"Michelle! Michelle, wake up!" She said.

The humongous girl stirred a bit. "Five more minutes..."

"Come on. You're drooling all over my carrier!" She continued lamenting. They'd been friends since high school. She knew her friend's lazy tendencies. Being hungover probably didn't help, either.

"Okay, okay! Stop yelling!" The mountain-like face rose up. Michelle propped her head up on her arm as she laid on her stomach, giving Cindy an unwelcome but familiar view of her friend's towering cleavage. Michelle was wearing a low-cut blue tank top, not unlike Cindy's. Despite their size difference, she and her six-mile-tall friend had a knack for wearing similar outfits. Two fingertips the sized of a dozen city blocks clamped onto either side of the carrier. She was carried up to a world-filling blue eye.

"Besides, that's not the worst way you've ever been woken up." The larger girl said with a giggle.

"Don't remind me." Cindy said, shaking off memories of her glass abode being sloshed by a tongue big enough to slurp up a town.

The two sat for a moment before...
1412.title: Pipsqueak Party-Animal

14121.content:
Cindy buckled herself in as her incomprehensibly large friend stood up. Michelle stretched, raising her hands as far as she could. Cindy felt like she was being carried to the heavens in her friend's palm. By Brobdingnagian standards, she was around 5'7 but to Cindy she was an astronomical six miles tall.

"Breakfast?" Michelle asked into her headset simply, eyeing her speck-like friend in the Tic-Tac sized carrier.

"You read my mind." Cindy rubbed her growling stomach.

Once in the kitchen, Michelle set the carrier on the table gently. Cindy opened the door and walked out onto the vast glazed wooden surface wanting to stretch her legs. They were both too tired and hungover to chat much.

"Bagels or waffles?" Michelle held up the two options across the room.

"Definitely bagels," Cindy said. Sharing waffles with a Brobby could get unbelievably sticky.

After retrieving a bagel big enough to wall in a small town, Michelle sat down at the table. Her colossal upper-body loomed above Cindy. Two cream-capped mountains jiggled and bounced off each other a bit as she settled in. Even the edge of her saucer stood high above Cindy's head. She began to spread strawberry jam on it with a towering butter-knife. As she did so, Michelle yawned downward, right in Cindy's direction. While it wasn't strong enough to blow the micro girl away, the humid gale blustered around her violently. A sweeping fog of morning breath stung her eyes. Cindy gagged a bit as she realized she could taste her friend's breath.

"Ugh! Why don't you ever brush your teeth before we eat?" She said between coughs.

"Quit whining, ya big baby." Michelle lowered her upside-down fingernail to Cindy

Cindy rolled her eye as she climbed on. The fingernail's thickness was almost taller than she was.

Secure, Cindy is lowered to...
14121.title: The Most Important Meal

choices: Diana: Gulliverian mother in a mixed-size family
142.content: Not too hard finding gentle Gulliverians.
142.title: Gulliverians

143.content: Gentle Brobdingnagians? Is that even possible? It sure is, just take a look at these fine Brobbies...
143.title: Brobdingnagians

1431.content:
The office was large by Brobbdy standards, and finely furnished, dark colored oak floors with a large area rug under two oak chairs with green leather seats and backs, secured with aged copper screws. A large desk sat before the chairs and behind that sat another chair, more modern though, black cloth and plastic, and on wheels. A loud 'click-clack' soon filled the old office as its owner entered and walked to her chair, her automatic door silently closing as she sat.

Victoria Small, the up and coming undefeated young lawyer with her own law firm at the young age of only 25. She was tall even for a Brobbdy, with shapely legs, and the seemingly natural figure of Olympian Brobbdies. Wide hips and a shapely rear end, Victoria's slightly larger than the average, and a tonned body. Her breasts were the envy of her female peers, F-cups. It was with this figure, her size, and just her sheer personality that she had never lost a case. She used her size to intimidate people, but never hurt.

She sat in her chair and flicked on her holoscreen computer, something only found in Olypmia thanks to the more integrated society, everyone could easily get top of the line Lillputian technology. The first thing that came up was the news, the head line making her frown.

'Size tensions rise as Brobbdies invade Lillputian home island' She sighed at her less enlightened cousins from the other side of the world. She clicked the story and brought up the article in detail. Two seperate incidents were being reported. A male brobbdy, a suspect in multiple disappearance cases regarding Lillputians and Gulliverians, had decimated a city, almost a million Lilliputians killed, the survivors describing it as nothing less than a 'sexual rampage'.

Another incident was actually two in one, apparently a mother- daughter tag team of sorts had obtained 'ambassador' pass ports, and were on their own string or rampage and murder. Victoria sneered at that, at their weakness of their mind. Many Brobbdies, even here in Olympia, had such thoughts and desires, but that's what separated them from their cousins. They had the mental strength to dismiss them. And while the consumption of Gulliverians and Lilliputians was permitted there was a legal market for it. No randomly abducting a city of Lilliputians, no plucking people off the streets. There were contracts involved, most people who ended up being eaten ended up there willingly.

The next part of the story made her grin. The Olympian prime minister vowed harsh sanctions against their fellow Brobbdies, and a freeze on accounts if rich Brobbdies.

"That will make them think twice." Victoria grinned as she brushed a strand of her blone hair over her ear. Almost all the advanced technology those uncivilized Brobbdies used was manufactured in Olympia. It would be an interesting state of affairs, and she might just see some clients out of it. She closed the international headlines and skimmed over the local stuff, sipping at her tea as she enjoyed her relaxing day, while it lasted.
1431.title: Victoria Small: Attorny at large

choices: Victoria and Carlos stay at the coffee shop and talk
Victoria and Carlos go back to Victoria’s
14312.content:
Victoria walked down the sidewalk with great excitement. Today was the day that she was to meet her new client. But what made this client different from the myriad of clients Victoria had already represented was that this client was a Lilliputian, her first lilliputian client in fact. Victoria had seen a lilliputian before of course, but she never truly spoken to one, as in never had she had a one on one conversation with a lilliputian before. Victoria had red the file, apparently the Lilliputian she was representing was a 26 year old man named Carlos Moya. Carlos was suing his ex wife who was a Gulliverian for attempted murder. Victoria showed great entrust for this case, she understood that mixed sized relationships where not against the law but where still rare, marriage even more so. The real question was what could have happened to cause this loving relationship between a Lilliputian and a Gulliverian to go so sower.

Victoria was to meet Carlos at a coffee shop called Mixed Sizes. As the named suggested this coffee shop was for Lilliputians, Gulliverians, and Brobdingnagians. There were very few restraints that served mixed size customers, for obvious reasons but this coffee shop in particular made it possible for people of mixed sizes to interact with each other in a safe environment. Mixed Sizes was a big coffee shop that supported three sections, each section bigger than the last. There was the Lilliputian section, where there stood 5 Brobdingnagian tables each one carrying thousand if not millions of Lilliputians. Since these Lilliputians where on top of these large tables only a Brobdingnagian could reach them. Then there was the Gulliverian section where hundred of Gulliverians sat and relaxed at their tables drinking there coffee. Unlike the Lilliputians the Gulliverians where not put on Brobdingnagian tables so for the first time in any of their lives the Gulliverians where looking up at the Lilliputians. Then there was the Brobdingnagian section, the biggest section, filled with 50 Brobdingnagian’s who where like gods to the smaller races. The coffee shop Mixed Sizes in forced one rule that was non negotiable. Sections where forbidden from interacting with each other, for their own safety of course. Lilliputians could not cross over to the Gulliverian section nor could the Gulliverians cross over to the Brobdingnagian section. The only exception was if both party’s agreed to the interaction, upon agree to the interaction the smaller race would be carried to bigger section.

Upon arriving at the coffee shop Victoria was seated in the Brobdingnagian section. There she patiently and eagerly waited for her client. Little did she know her client did not feel the same excitement she was herself was feeling.

Carlos Moya hated his stupidity more than ever. Here he was making the same mistake he made before, trusting another giant person, and this giant was even bigger than his bitch of a ex wife. It was to late for regrets, he was already here in Olympia, he already had a meeting with Victoria Small. Deep down Carlos knew that the only way for him to be free from his ex wife was to believe in Victoria, but it was hard trusting some one so big, so gigantic, especially when he had already done so and it literally blew up in his face. Rumor has it, the Brobdingnagians that live here in Olympia are more polite and gentle than their cousins that live in foreign land, but could Carlos really trust a rumor, especially when his own life was on the line.

“I’m looking for a Carlos Moya.” A young Gulliverian waitress said with a booming voice as she looked down on the thousands of Lilliputians that littered the Brobdingnagian tables. The Gulliverian waitress was riding on a hover cruiser made for Gulliverians. The hover cruiser was one of the inventions that was only created and sold in Olympia, it was made off of the same design as the Lilliputian cruiser that helps Lilliputians travel.

Carlos upon hearing his name stood up from his seat and raised his hand. “I’m Carlos Moya!” He yelled trying not to sound nerves.

The giant waitress looked at Carlos for a few seconds, and soon smiled. “You have a meeting with a Brobdingnagian women named Victoria Small, is that correct?” The giant waitress asks.

At this moment every Lilliputian looked at Carlos with a shocked look on their face. A Lilliputian meeting with a Gulliverian was not unheard of, but meeting with a Brobdingnagian was rare. It couldn’t be true

Carlos (embarrass by all of the shocked looks everyone was giving him) answered the giant waitresses question. “Yes that is correct.”

The Lilliputians could not believe it this man was really meaning a Brobdingnagian. Some Lilliputians looked at Carlos with envy and rage, others with disbelief and pity. This kind of interaction rarely ever ends well, all they could do was watch as the Gulliverian waitress picked up Carlos and and flew away on her hover cruiser, towards the holy ground, which was the Brobdingnagian section.

It did not take the waitress and Carlos long to get to the Brobdingnagian area, just a few seconds in fact. The giant waitress along the way shielded Carlos with her hand so he was not effected by the air pressure to much.

“Ok here we are.” The waitress said dropping Carlos on the hard wood floor which Carlos recognized as the exact same table he was on before, the only difference was that their was no one else on this great expanse only him.

“Ive brought him ma’am” the giant waitress said.

Carlos looked at the waitress and noticed that she was looking up at something. Before the waitress left she gave Carlos his very own head set and instructed him on how to use it.

“Hello.” Carlos says into the head set.

“HELLOS MR. MOYA MY NAME IS VICTORIA SMALL ITS A PLEASURE TO MEET YOU.” Victoria’s voice shook Carlos to his core. Carlos found himself on his butt, for he could no longer stand because of the earthquake generated by Victoria’s voice

The earth quake cake to a abrupt stop, and yet still Carlos was horrified not because of Victoria’s display of power but because of the site before his eyes. A 300ft blue gigantic eye was staring right at him.

“Ms Victoria I presume”
14312.title: Victoria meets with new clients

choices: Carlos goes and stays with Victoria
143121.content:
This was a new experience for Victoria. To Victoria she was talking with a man smaller than a speck of dust. White cloth covered the table, so Victoria was able to make out Carlos minuscule form, which appeared as a very small colored dot, in the middle of a ocean of white. Victoria wore a headset, to hear Carlos. She couldn’t believe how normal Carlos sounded. Lilliputians, what fascinating little creatures.

Carlos world was shaking by the second. He knew that these earthquakes were caused by Victoria speaking. The Gulliverian waitress had left, leaving Carlos alone with Victoria. Deep down Carlos wished that she had stayed, one for support, and two for a quick exit if he needed one, but alas here he was standing before this titan, that completely dwarfed his ex wife, with ease. He couldn’t do this, he had to leave this god forsaken place. Carlos looking up at Victoria couldn’t even see her whole entire face, which was hidden by her gigantic mile long breasts, which were firmly planted on the table, as close as Carlos was to Victoria, Victoria was just to wide to massive for Carlos to make her full visage out.

“MR. MOYA?” Victoria says with a booming voice.

“Yes ma’am.” Carlos jumps a little from Victoria’s voice shaking him out of his trance.

“I THINK IT WOULD BE BEST TO JUST JUMP RIGHT INTO YOUR CASE.”

“Oh yes, I suppose you are right.”

Carlos couldn’t leave not now, if he was to put a end to this injustice then he had to stay, and face his fears.

Victoria could feel the uncertainty in Carlos voice, and she didn’t blame him for being scared. She understood that Carlos was in alien territory, territory filled with gigantic beings that where more likely to kill him by accident then on purpose. Victoria didn’t know how Carlos felt, even among her fellow Brobdingnagians she was taller than most, even men. The point was that she rarely had to look up at anyone, she was almost always looking down at people. There were even a few instances where she used her height to intimidate people, but never hurt. But to Carlos she was beyond intimidating, and he was obviously scared, and yet here he stood his ground, for reason still unknown to Victoria, for now. Carlos had earned Victoria’s respect, which wasn’t easy to do. Victoria let out a little giggle. She couldn’t help but think that, this little man had earned her respect, something that other Brobdingnagians had failed to do. What a man. She thought leaning forward, looking down at the little dot on the table.

“SO MR. MOYA HOW ABOUT YOU TELL ME YOUR STORY.” Victoria said.

“You can just call me Carlos Ms.Victoria.” Carlos said in a low voice into his headset.

“OH? OK NOT REALLY PROFESSIONAL, BUT OK, IF WE ARE ON A FISRT NAME BASES NOW YOU CAN CALL ME VICTORIA.”

Victoria smiled at the Carlos. She actually preferred it this way, she believed that calling each other by your first names would help Carlos relax.

“OK CARLOS HOW ABOUT YOU EXPLAIN.”

“Oh yes of course.” Carlos says stepping forward.

“My wife, my ex-wife is out to kill me.” Carlos says

Upon hearing this Victoria shook a little in anger. This anger was nothing new to her, she had felt hundreds of times, whenever a Brobdingnagian or in this case a Gulliverian missed used their power she had felt it, but this time to her confusion her anger seemed to flare even more powerful than usual.

Carlos fell to the hard ground, a little startled by the sudden earthquake more powerful than any other, he had experienced.

“Uh Ma’am, I mean Victoria are you ok.” Carlos asks

“UH YES, SORRY JUST GETTING COMFORTABLE, PLEASE CONTINUE.” Victoria says feeling a little embarrass. Victoria saw Carlos fall down and felt a little bad.”SORRY IT WONT HAPPEN AGAIN.” Victoria knew that she had to control herself, her getting angry would only put Carlos in danger.

Carlos remained seated as he told his story to Victoria. Carlos told Victoria about his ex-wife who was named Jill Wagner, Carlos told her how he met Jill at a bar and one thing led to another and they found themselves in a relationship. They had been married for 4 years. This completely surprised Victoria. Carlos soon grew sad as he continued his story. Carlos told Victoria how Jill became pregnant. Victoria first came to the conclusion that Jill. Cheated on Carlos, but that was never the case. Jill was pregnant with Carlos baby, a Gulliverian was pregnant with a Lilliputian child.

“WHAT!!!!” Victoria jumping up from her chair, towering over the speck on her table. Victoria drew the attention of many of the Brobdingnagians that were seated by her. They couldn’t see Carlos, who was less than the size of a speck to all of them so many of them thought she was crazy, beautiful, but still crazy.

To Carlos this simple action had caused him a lot of pain. Carlos went flying back a few feet from the winds generated from Victoria standing up. Carlos had to cover his ears to prevent them from bursting, because of Victoria’s loud shout. By the time Carlos came to his senses he saw something that utterly scared him. Victoria standing up totally casting his Lilliputian form into her shadow. She was bigger than any mountain, bigger than a 1000 lilliputian skyscrapers. Victoria’s face was no longer blocked by her massive bosom, therefore Carlos eyes were able to see her massive face. Massive wasn’t the right word, their was no word to explain how huge Victoria was, but through the fear even Carlos had to admit she was beautiful. Victoria’s face was miles away from Carlos so Carlos was able to make it out, if only a little.

Victoria soon realized what she had done, along with a few Brobdingnagians looking at her like she had lost her mind. Once again she was embarrassed, and when she looked down at Carlos she realized that he was not in the same place he was before, instead he was a few feet away from his previous destination.

“MY GOODNESS ARE YOU OK.” Victoria asks sitting down and leaning in to inspect the little man.

“Uh y, yes Victoria I’m fine.” Carlos says.

Victoria could hear the fear in Carlos voice, she knew that she was responsible.

“I AM SO SORRY BUT YOUR STORY IS HARD TO SWALLOW.”

Victoria says pushing a few strands of hair behind her head.

To Carlos Victoria moving her body was like watching a whole land mass move, and it quite frankly amazed him. Carlos didn’t blame Victoria for not believing his story. He couldn’t believe it ether. Their had never been a child born of two different races before. Scientist believed it to be impossible, because the anatomy of a Lilliputian, Gulliverian, and a Brobdingnagian was different. They were all in a sense human beings but, humans with a few changes in them, these changes make a big differences, like the massive size differences between the three races. It is because of this difference in anatomy that Lilliputians can be eaten by a Gulliverian or a Brobdingnagian, and it is not called cannibalism.

Victoria started to relies how huge this case really was, this was history, it was the kind of case lawyers dream of, and it was all hers. Victoria couldn’t help but fill happy.

“Yes me and Jill were about to have a baby.” Victoria turns her attention back to Carlos, reminding herself that this wasn’t just about her.

“And even though I was so happy about this new life coming into our lives, Jill, she was angry.” Carlos says with a dark angry tone, that caught Victoria by surprise.

Carlos told Victoria about how he and jill got into huge arguments about the baby. Jill wanted a abortion, but it was to late the baby was already fully formed in her stomach. The baby was so small that Jill didn’t have a baby bump or anything, nobody if looking at her would never even think she was pregnant. Jill soon had the baby, the birthing process was very easy for Jill, and it went smoothly. They had given birth to a healthy boy, that had Lilliputian and Gulliverian blood running through his vain. The doctors did not know how big the boy would get, but figured he would be a little bigger than a Lilliputian.

“WELL THATS GREAT, YOU MUST BE SO PROUD.” Victoria said, still amazed at this miracle.

“Oh I was, I was so proud.” Carlos begins to cry a little.

Victoria was confused, was like in pas-tense.

“We went home right after Jill gave birth to our son, in the car Jill didn’t speak a word, she didn’t even look happy, nor did she look at me or her son, she just drove the car all the way home.” Carlos said still crying.

“When we got home Jill carried me and the baby inside the house. When we got in the house she took the baby from my hands and, and......”

Carlos couldn’t say it, he didn’t want to say it, but he knew he had to.

“AND WHAT?” Victoria had a general idea of what Carlos bitch of a ex-wife did, and it really pissed her off. She looked down at Carlos with tears starting to appear in her own eyes.

“She killed our son, crushing him in her own hands.” Carlos said putting his head in his hands.

It was silent for a few minutes, neither Carlos, or Victoria said a single word.

“Jill and me divorced, and now she wants me dead, because I threatened to bring her to justice.” Carlos says finally breaking the long silences.

“Jill knows powerful people who are also Gulliverians. All of them are dead set in seeing me dead. So Ms. smalls you are my only hope. I don’t care what I have to pay, but please help m.....

A huge pile of flesh covers Carlos mouth preventing him from speaking.

“DONT WORRY I WONT LET THEM HURT YOU.”
143121.title: Victoria and Carlos stay at the coffee shop and...

choices: A Fashion Shoot with some fellow Lilliputians and Gulliverians.
A Dress Try Out with some highly skilled Lillputians.
A Mixed Size Gala Event to kick off a new Fashion Line.
1432.content:
Miranda Hart was in an industry where at 24 years old it could have been easy to turn into a greedy or selfish person who viewed her career above everything. And it was true that her work as one of the leading and beautiful models in Olympia was important and rewarding to her, but she'd found the happiness and joy she'd given to her fellow co-workers, friends and family much more significant. Miranda was clearly incredibly attractive with her long brown hair, a well toned and developed physique, fine curves, perked bottom and 36 DD cups after some three years in the industry. But people who knew her well said it was her kindness and consideration for others which defined her.

Checking over an array of photographs from her latest shoot amid a flick of her slender pink fingers, Miranda reviewed them in turn as she sat in her apartment, nodding and smiling her trademark smile at the ones she considered best, usually the ones which were sexy but tasteful. She had no worries about allowing her body to be shown off in beautiful ways, just as long as the context was fine. Miranda knew she had her fans across all three nations and loved them for doing so, though she was still currently single. Recently she'd been thinking about trying to rectify that, but finding the right sort of guy wasn't always easy in her line, especially when she was after someone who'd view her personality and desire to help others - as evidenced by some work she'd undertaken for Gulliverian and Lilliputian charities.

Since she'd been a bright and spunky little girl Miranda had been very curious - but in a kind way and quite unlike some of her more violent Brobdingnagian cousins - about the smaller nations of her world. She liked the tiny peoples, imagining them roaming across her palms, exploring her hair and perching on her nose tip. And since being aware that she had fans in Gulliver and Lilliput, there was a part of her which wondered whether she could do more for one of them. There was something wonderfully excited about dating a man who could explore her vast fingers and tipped toes, where she'd be a landscape as much as a lover. There were hundreds of Brobdingnagian and Gulliverian relationships in her country, and she had long heard that the people of Gulliver were liable doing the same with some of the people of Lilliput. But a Brobdingnagian dating a Lillputian? Or marrying? Unheard of. Miranda bit her lip, knowing that so many of her less enlightened people really only viewed Lilliput people for a few purposes, virtually none pleasant. Maybe just dating a Gulliverian would be easier, after all this time.

With a long sigh she straightened her slightly tall 5'8 body from the computer and smiled. If she was the first to try, it would probably be taken as something of a publicity stunt by some who already knew her good works for the tiny nation. Better she'd find someone from either nation quietly and done properly, whether that ended up being some kind person out of showbiz altogether or in a similar field on a tinier scale who was genuinely good like her. But in any case, she had some work to take care of today, right?
1432.title: Miranda: Desirable Brobby model

Yea, I know the Swift Universe is already fantasy enough, but this is like fantasy within a fantasy. I implore the reader to enter with an open mind; and I ask the writer to let his/her imagination run wild.

Let’s jump in and see how deep the universe really is…
15.title: The Enigmatic Universe

choices: Carrie: They're going to laugh at you
151.content:
From Wikipedia.org:

Psychokinesis (Greek ψυχή κίνησις, "mind movement"), or telekinesis (τῆλε κίνησις, "distance movement"), is an alleged psychic ability allowing a person to influence a physical system without physical interaction.

Telepathy is the purported transmission of information from one person to another without using any of our known sensory channels or physical interaction.
151.title: Telekinesis/Telepathy

1511.content:
Private Olin mashed the top button of his alarm clock that signified it was 0430 in red LED numbers. He flipped over onto his back on his springy bed as he fought the urge to go back to sleep. Olin stared at the ceiling with tired eyes for several minutes as he tried to wake up his body. Ten more minutes had passed and he was still in bed. Olin sighed as he lifted his upper body up into a seated position. His mouth was dry, his head heavy, and vision blurred.

The carpeting in the barracks was similar to those in hospital waiting rooms. The carpet fibers were thin, rough, and stain resistant. Olin’s bare feet thumped across the teal colored carpet to the shared toilet. He could only wish that his roommate didn’t lock his side of the bathroom again. He twisted the door handle—it was unlocked. Maybe it wasn’t going to be a bad day for Olin.

In basic training, the Lilliputian soldiers were taught to perform the three ‘S’ in rapid succession. Shit, shower, and shave—in that order. It’s been almost a year out of basic, and Olin was still practicing the ritual with increasing efficiency. He pooped. He showered. He cut his neck shaving. He slipped on his olive drab uniform and black leather boots. He could already tell that his supervisor was going to give him shit for not spit shining his boots, but it was too early in the morning for Olin to give a shit about that. Before leaving his room, Olin pulled the little white pieces of toilet paper stained with a red dot from his neck and tossed it in the trash.

It was another beautiful, dark, foggy morning. The yellow lamps that littered the base hummed and glowed their bile colored yellow. The sun was still asleep and had another hour before it rose up. In the meantime, the sky had a dark purple hue. Olin could smell the water in the air thanks to the extra heavy fog that morning. He walked across the bricked footpath that weaved around a Gulliverian sized tree. It was time for the best part of the morning—breakfast.

The mess hall served disgusting food for Lunch and Dinner but breakfast was hard to fuck up, even for DFAC. The morning air around the mess hall always smelled of fried eggs, bacon, and sausage. Any soldier in the vicinity had their stomach’s gurgling and their mouthwatering for some good ol’ fashioned Lilliputian breakfast. Except, most soldiers were still asleep in their warm comfortable beds. Olin and a few others were the unlucky ones to have to start their shifts at the butt crack of dawn.

Olin ate his eggs and bacon alone. He took a bite of his muffin and almost spat it out because of the freezer burn taste. The fake eggs and not so crispy bacon were good enough. Thanks to a heaping dollop of hot sauce. There were only two other soldiers in the dining on their breakfast. They were quiet and emotionless.
